title: Complementary and alternative therapies for diabetes
author: Naina Mohamed; PhD Follow Pharmacologist
description: Complementary and alternative therapies for diabetes - Download as a PDF or view online for free
cleaned_text: Herbal Supplements (Bitter melon (Momordica charantia), (Chromium, Vanadium and Alpha Lipoic acid) and Physical interventions (Yoga, Acupuncture, Hydrotherapy, Massage Therapy, Aromatherapy, Chromotherapy, Biofeedback) are the common employed CAM practices to treat Diabetes.
